problems.headline: Managing your community shouldn't be this hard
problems.subheadline: The same problems repeat across thousands of Barcelona communities. You shouldn't have to keep dealing with them.

arrears.title: €8,400 average unpaid fees per building
arrears.description: Neighbors stop paying and nothing happens. There's no tracking, no reminders, no escalation. The president chases people door to door while debt compounds quietly.
arrears.solution: Veina automates payment tracking and reminders

opacity.title: You have no idea where your money goes
opacity.description: You pay €150/month but can't see a real breakdown. The administrator sends a PDF once a year that raises more questions than it answers. Trust erodes.
opacity.solution: Veina shows every euro in real time

meetings.title: 3-hour meetings, zero decisions
meetings.description: The same 8 people argue while 40 others never show up. Decisions stall for months. Those absent have no voice and no record of what happened.
meetings.solution: Veina enables digital voting from your phone

vendors.title: You're overpaying by 20-40% on repairs
vendors.description: Your administrator picks the vendor and takes a cut you never see. No competitive quotes, no transparency on pricing. One plumbing job shouldn't cost €3,000.
vendors.solution: Veina lets you compare verified quotes directly

solution.headline: Community management, reinvented
solution.subheadline: Three pillars to make your community work the way it should.

transparency.title: Total transparency
transparency.description: Every euro tracked, every expense visible. Any neighbor can check the accounts in real time.

decisions.title: Drama-free decisions
decisions.description: Digital voting, clear communication, and automatic minutes. No more 3-hour meetings.

vendors.title: Commission-free vendors
vendors.description: Compare real quotes from verified vendors. No middlemen inflating the price.

howItWorks.headline: Get started in 3 minutes
howItWorks.subheadline: Setting up your community on Veina is easier than scheduling a meeting.

register.title: Register your community
register.description: Enter your building's basic info and create your community profile.

invite.title: Invite your neighbors
invite.description: Share a link via WhatsApp. Each neighbor joins from their phone in 30 seconds.

manage.title: Manage from your phone
manage.description: Fees, voting, incidents, and vendors. Everything in your pocket.

whoItsFor.headline: Designed for those who live the community
whoItsFor.subheadline: Whether you're a president or an owner, Veina simplifies your life.

president.title: Presidents

president.bullet1: Automatic tracking of fees and arrears

owner.title: Owners
owner.description: Know where every euro goes. Participate without attending meetings.
owner.bullet2: Vote from your phone in under a minute
